Spectral analysis of standardized values. ( a) δ 18O records in ostracode shells from the N2015 core. ( b) δ 18O records in ostracode shells from the X core
19 . ( c) Atmospheric 14C
23 . Numbers show the periodicities for the main spectral peaks. The 0.01 and 0.05 significance levels are shown as dashed red lines.
